description: This trap indicates that a software upgrade to the
specified Software Path directory has been initiated
by the user for this shelf.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSoftwareUpgradeInitiatedNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfAdmnDirectory s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

description: The new software distribution directory name.
This MIB object can only be set by a user with admin
privileges.
variables.name: SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfAdmnDirectory

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that a software upgrade to the
specified Software Path directory has terminated in
this shelf for the specified reason.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSoftwareUpgradeTerminatedNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfAdmnDirectory s EXAMPLE SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfStatLastReason i 0 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

description: The new software distribution directory name.
This MIB object can only be set by a user with admin
privileges.
variables.name: SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfAdmnDirectory

description: Indicates the exit reason of the last live software upgrade.
variables.name: SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfStatLastReason

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that a software upgrade to the
specified Software Path directory has succeeded in
this shelf for the specified reason.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSoftwareUpgradeSucceededNotification SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex i 1 SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfAdmnDirectory s EXAMPLE SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfStatLastReason i 0 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: The shelf index of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusShelfIndex

description: The new software distribution directory name.
This MIB object can only be set by a user with admin
privileges.
variables.name: SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfAdmnDirectory

description: Indicates the exit reason of the last live software upgrade.
variables.name: SONUS-SOFTWARE-UPGRADE-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSwUpgradeShelfStatLastReason

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel
